zh.doc.DingTalkRebot.707708-1: 通知配置可以结合通知配置为告警消息通知提供支撑。也可以用于系统中其他自定义模块的调用。
zh.doc.DingTalkRebot.707708-3: 在钉钉群内每创建一个钉钉群自定义机器人都会产生唯一的WebHook地址。
zh.doc.DingTalkRebot.707708-4: 获取路径：“钉钉桌面客户端”--“群设置”--“智能群助手”--“机器人信息”
zh.doc.DingTalkRebot.707708-5: 1、登录钉钉桌面客户端，进入群设置
zh.doc.DingTalkRebot.707708-6: 2、点击智能群助手，查看机器人信息

en.doc.DingTalkRebot.707708-1: Notification configuration can be combined with notification configuration to provide support for alarm message notifications. It can also be used for calling other custom modules in the system.
en.doc.DingTalkRebot.707708-3: Each custom robot created in the DingTalk group will generate a unique WebHook address.
en.doc.DingTalkRebot.707708-4: Get path: "DingTalk Desktop Client" - "Group Settings" - "Intelligent Group Assistant" - "Robot Information"
en.doc.DingTalkRebot.707708-5: 1. Log in to the DingTalk desktop client and enter the group settings
en.doc.DingTalkRebot.707708-6: 2. Click on the intelligent group assistant to view robot information
